profile.summary:
Full-stack software developer with experience in design & development of micro-services based products, modules as well as sub-components for software products.

Experience of working with a plethora of technologies including, but not limited to, Angular, Spring Boot, Node.js, SQL, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS and Git.

Experience of working with prominent programming languages (Java and C++) and scripting languages (JavaScript & Python).

Highly comfortable working over the Linux environment.

Well-acquainted to working as per Agile methodology of software development.
profile.headline: Software Engineer at Gainsight

experience.description: Working as a member of the sys-admin track of Hypersense, a micro-services based augmented analytics product. Built several features of the constituent micro-services.
experience.title: Senior Software Engineer

experience.description: Worked in the roadmap (R&D) team for the product "ROC Fraud Management", where my responsibilities were to work across the stack and implement product features and modules, with unit tests coverage, within a strict time-frame and as per quality standards.
experience.title: Software Engineer

experience.companyName: Indian Institute of Information Technology Guwahati
experience.description: Worked on a research-oriented project in the domain of blockchain-based identity management which led to a publication titled "A Framework for Maintaining Citizenship Record on Blockchain" under the proceedings of "BSCI '19 Proceedings of the 2019 ACM International Symposium on Blockchain and Secure Critical Infrastructure".
experience.title: Summer (Research) Intern

experience.description: Explored and learnt about the blockchain technology and blockchain-based application development. Implemented the learning by building applications using the Solidity language over the Rinkeby test network.
experience.title: Winter (Blockchain) Intern

publications.name: A Framework for Maintaining Citizenship Record o Blockchain
publications.publisher: BSCI '19 Proceedings of the 2019 ACM International Symposium on Blockchain and Secure Critical Infrastructure

member.occupation: Engineer @ Gojek || Interested in Research collaborations
Software Engineer at Alation | Ex-Zalonian | MEAN Stack | Deep Learning | Hadoop

projects.description: An academic project in which we trained several GANs and employed style transfer algorithms so as to generate unseen handloom cloth designs from a dataset composed of Assamese handloom saree cloth as well as ordinary sarees. We built a design tool with Angular to interact with the trained models so as to generate inferences based on users’ inputs.
projects.title: Generating Handloom Designs using Generative AI
